channel.title: Accessing client methods
channel.description:
[code]Caused by: java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: Expected non-static field client.hs at client.getNpcNodeArray(Unknown Source)
[/code]
client.hs is npc node array, injected my getter, just can't access my getter. Can't cast the applet to client like I use to be able to, so I'm kind of stuck. I also xbooted -verbose with the client and I didn't see anything outstanding that would stop it. Any poking and prodding in the right direction would be appreciated.

item.title: Accessing client methods
item.dc:creator: @packersfa52 packersfa52
item.description:
@packersfa52 wrote:

[quote=“veer, post:2, topic:444479”]1) The error means you’re accessing client.hs via getfield rather than getstatic, which fails the verification pass in the JVM.
2) Why can’t you downcast the Applet to client?
3) How did you “xbooted -verbose”?[/quote]

Solved it, I relaized I wasn’t injecting my client interface of all iterfaces, -verbose param. Finds useful class information.

Read full topic

item.title: Accessing client methods
item.dc:creator: @slavemaster veer
item.description:
@slavemaster wrote:

  1. The error means you’re accessing client.hs via getfield rather than getstatic, which fails the verification pass in the JVM.
  2. Why can’t you downcast the Applet to client?
  3. How did you “xbooted -verbose”?

Read full topic
